OUR INTENTION IS TO LEVEL THE PLAYING FIELD AND PROVIDE A CHANCE TO THOSE WHO ARENâ€™T FORTUNATE ENOUGH TO HAVE THE ADEQUATE RESOURCES AT THEIR DISPOSAL. OUR IDEOLOGY LIES IN THE FACT THAT SOCCER CAN CHANGE A LIFE AS IT HAS MANY TIMES BEFORE.
